extractedData.name: MAGESHWARAN R
extractedData.title: Senior Consultant – AI Engineering
extractedData.summary: Seasoned AI Engineer with a distinguished seven-year tenure in designing and implementing advanced Natural Language Processing and Document Intelligence systems.

experience.description: Leading the design, development, and delivery of Document Intelligence solutions to accelerate Clinical Study Design, Regulatory Submissions, Health Authority Interactions, and Patient Safety processes.
achievements: Led the development and delivery of million-scale RAG pipeline for Clinical Study documents saving 12K FTE hours with a projection of 2.5M USD savings in 5 years
Led the development and delivery of Information Extraction and Metadata Tagging solutions saving 28K FTE hours
Developed a PoC on multi-agent workflow to automate study feasibility analysis
Consulting a project on a multi-agent clinical development chat assistant

experience.description: Developed Multilingual NLP pipelines for Sentiment Classification of Tourism Reviews, Cross-lingual Semantic Similarity, and Semantic Search for Tourism Products Analytics.
achievements: Implemented end-to-end multilingual search application for the tourism industry
Architected ETL and Data QA solutions for Data Warehousing of Tourism Products and Reviews

experience.jobTitle: AI Engineer (Early member in AI Group)
experience.description: Research and Development of Information Extraction Systems for Electronic Health Records.
achievements: Research and Implementation of Named Entity Recognition models
Research work on Document Layout Understanding using LayoutLM

experience.description: Responsible for Research and Implementation of State-of-the-Art techniques in DCNN.
achievements: Hyper-parameter tuning of Deep Convolutional Neural Networks for Lane Detection and Traffic Sign Recognition
Worked on end-to-end Computer Vision pipeline

education.university: R.M.K College of Engineering and Technology
